alert.note: Alert for Coastal Nassau; Trout River; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 5:10PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern St. Johns, northeastern Clay and Duval Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 510 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ortega, or near Jacksonville, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Orange Park, Unf, Mandarin, Fruit Cove, Arlington, Ponte Vedra Beach, Jacksonville Beach, Atlantic Beach and Neptune Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Nassau; Trout River; Western Duval
